Previous Next

ISO 27001/ISO 27002

Consultancy. Definition of objectives. Creation of a Master Plan. ISMS implementation.

GDPR

Consultancy. Current situation. Action plan.

National Security Scheme (ENS)

Compliance adequacy plan. Implantation. Maintenance.

Implementation of Solutions

Analysis, design and implementation of cybersecurity solutions. Implementation and integration of IT infrastructures. Bastion of devices.

Managed Security

Monitoring and correlation of events. Vulnerability management. Operation and administration of the security infrastructure. Incident response.

Industrial Security

Control of processes, people and technologies for the protection of industrial infrastructures. Industrial Control Systems (ICS) Security. SCADA Security. Monitoring of industrial systems.

Analysis and Forensic Expertise

Computer expert opinions for defense in the criminal field. Device analysis and verification of actions carried out. Software Analysis. Network Analysis.

Software Audits

Detection of code vulnerabilities. Analysis of communication protocols. Implementation of secure development methodology. Analysis of applications for mobile devices.

Training

Training for non-technical personnel. Awareness plans. Conferences and talks. Specific courses for personnel I.
